title: 1 hospitalized after shooting in store parking lot on Broadway
content:
One person was hospitalized after a shooting in the Food Source parking lot on Broadway near 44th Street, according to media reports.
Sacramento Police Department investigators told CBS Sacramento that an unidentified man was taken to the nearby UC Davis Medical Center with non-life-threatening injuries, but there are no details on a suspect or motive in the shooting.
Few details have been released.
